name: Aquarium Sandbox
description: Aquarium Sandbox is an aquarium simulator that allows you to learn, config, and share an underwater world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+(without wallpapers) Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS 640 лю Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 Storage: 1 GB available space
